text: Camila Cabello is giving fans a first look at merchandise from her upcoming Never Be the Same Tour! The 21 - year - old songstress took to her Twitter to show off a photo wearing one special piece from the merch collection. In the pic, Camila can be seen wearing a yellow hoodie with NBTS printed on the front and sleeves while the back features lyrics from the song. “ preview of # NeverBeTheSameTour merch coming soon, ” Camila captioned the photo.
